name: The Light! It Burns!
description:
Avoid harmful rays of light and hide in the shadows as you venture towards the comfort of complete darkness in this action/puzzle game!

Made for Weekly Game Jam #144 (Theme - In The Dark)

I had a lot of fun making this game, and I think there is potential for it to be extended. Let me know what you all think!

--

Controls:

WASD (or arrow keys) - move

J - Push/Pull crate

ESC - quit application

--

Font - https://joebrogers.itch.io/bitpotion

Music and Sound Effects by Evan Wardell
